message.content:
I need to identify the value representing the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the given financial statements.

Looking at the income statement, the "Cost of Goods Sold" line item represents the cost of inventory that was sold during the period. This is the standard line item that represents carrying amount of inventories sold in financial reporting.

From the income statement, I can see:
```
Cost of Goods Sold | 544970.00 | 2024-02-01
```

This amount (544,970.00) represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the reporting period ending February 1, 2024.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '544970.00'} }
```
